spiritsExplanation:
The workout title and description prominently feature 'HIIT', which suggests a 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit, as HIIT workouts generally are fast-paced and designed to maximize effort even if described as beginner-friendly. This spirit is given a score of 0.65 to reflect its prominent presence with moderate intensity due to its beginner adjustments. 

The mention of a '25-Minute Fusion Workout' combining various styles such as dancing, walking, and kickboxing, and the comments about the enjoyable experience suggest a 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit. This is characterized by continuous movement and music-driven engagement. Thus, it scores 0.6.

There is also an element of 'Structured & Disciplined' characteristics given the planned 25-min session divided into specific types of exercises, such as Pilates and weights, indicating a methodical approach to building skills across different disciplines. This is given a score of 0.5, reflecting a moderate presence.

Other spirits such as 'Soothing & Restorative' were excluded due to the emphasis on HIIT and kickboxing, which do not suggest gentle or restorative properties. There is no indication of 'Outdoor & Adventure' or 'Sport & Agility' provided by the indoor nature and general fitness focus of the workout.
